name: Crazy Eye Blocks
description:
Crazy Eye Blocks, a new unique puzzle game that is addicting, play a total of 20 challenging levels in Crazy Eye Blocks. This is an ultimate challenging skill game.

Here Your Task is Clear All Eye Blocks. Click At the group of three or more Eye Blocks of the same color and they will disappear. Play 20 Amazing Levels. Have fun!
Crazy Eye Blocks entertains you many hours of fun to play. It has stunning graphics and with a new unique game play you won't get bored.

Game Features:
• FREE TO PLAY!
• A different grades of challenge for every level.
• Includes 20 Amazing Levels to play.
• Competitive game plays with nice controls.
• High quality graphics.
• Extreme skill set requirements
• Unique game play
• Addicting
• Amazing vivid graphics
• Easy to learn, hard to master
